ENGLISH: The ideals of the French Revolution were believed to have met their final demise at the hands of the Ancien Régimes of Europe. The flames of revolution may have been put out for now, but a new threat was looming up on the horizon. A spreading sickness was turning people into something unrecognizable, and panic spread through the populace. The future was uncertain and the looming threat could unleash untold horrors. Survival was the only option, as the world braced for the coming storm.
